body:
Hi Atta,



The simulation works fine on my machine, I do get the same error an explanation of the error can be seen here: [https://unmethours.com/question/4372/severe-error-with-non-convex-s...](https://unmethours.com/question/4372/severe-error-with-non-convex-surfaces/)



This is not really a severe error but by making all your surfaces convex it may change the results. I couldn't see any non-convex surfaces in your model, but if you can find them and convert them to convex surfaces the error will go away.
